mapper.select: select q.pno, q.mno, q.tno, q.title, q.secret, q.reply, q.rpl_dttm, p.content, p.wdttm, p.view_cnt, p.pstat, m.profile_pic, m.name, m.nickname, f.fno, f.fname, m.name, m.mstat, r.trpl_fno, r.trpl_fname from har_tqna q inner join har_member m on m.mno=q.mno inner join har_post p on p.pno=q.pno left join har_file f on f.pno=p.pno inner join har_tutor t on t.tno=q.tno left join har_trpl_file r on r.pno=q.pno where p.pstat=1 order by q.pno desc

select q.pno, q.mno, q.tno, q.title, q.secret, q.reply, q.rpl_dttm, p.content, p.wdttm, p.view_cnt, p.pstat, m.profile_pic, m.name, m.nickname, f.fno, f.fname, m.name, m.mstat from har_tqna q inner join har_member m on m.mno=q.mno inner join har_post p on p.pno=q.pno left join har_file f on f.pno=p.pno inner join har_tutor t on t.tno=q.tno where q.pno = #{no} and p.pstat=1 order by q.pno
